regtests.input: # This is a comment
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 COMPONENTS

#NODEFAULT 
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
#DEFAULT 
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 COMPONENTS
#ENDDEFAULT

#SHORTCUT 
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
 
 #EXPANSION 
d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 COMPONENTS
#ENDEXPANSION
__FILL__

d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 
PRINT ARG=d1
p: POSITION ATOM=@replicas:{1,2}

d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 
PRINT ARG=d1
b: BIASVALUE ARG=d1

#SHORTCUT 
 #NODEFAULT 
 d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
 #DEFAULT 
 d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
 #ENDDEFAULT 
 #EXPANSION 
 d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2
 #ENDEXPANSION
# vim:ft=plumed

d1: GROUP ATOMS=@mdatoms 
t1: TORSION ATOMS=@phi-3
t2: TORSION ATOMS=@psi-4_3
g1: GROUP ATOMS=@mda:backbone

COMMITTOR ... 
 ARG=t1,t2 
 #C2 basin 
 BASIN_LL1=-2.7,-1.3 BASIN_UL1=-1.9,-1.0 
 #C3 basin 
 BASIN_LL2=-2.7,0.9 BASIN_UL2=-2.3,1.2 
 ...

d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 
ENDPLUMED 
 DISTANCE BOND=1,2

d1_lp1: ... 
  DISTANCE
  ATOMS=17,1311
 ...

d1: DISTANCE ATOMS=1,2 
DISTANCE ... #fff
 LABEL=d2 #ttt
 ATOMS=3,4
 ...

d1: distance atoms=1,2 
distance ... #fff
 label=d2 #ttt
 atoms=3,4
 ...

r1: GYRATION ATOMS=@mda:{resid 1:40 and name CA}
 r2: GYRATION ATOMS={@mda:{resid 1:40 and name CA}}

phi: TORSION ATOMS=1,2,3,4
 bb: RESTRAINT ARG=phi KAPPA=200.0 AT=@replicas:__FILL__

# This is a comment 
 phi: TORSION ATOMS=1,2,3,4 # This is also a comment with : a colon
comments: # This is also a comment with : a colon
